info.name: Bitbucket Server Dark v6.7.1
info.description: Dark mode for Bitbucket v6.7.1.  Modified version Bitbucket Server Dark from DaemonExMachina. Please let me know if you run into any problems.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.0.0 - initial release
v1.0.1 - fixing a bug where viewing a new file would sometimes get cut off.
